There are two snaps for growth, but you could add a third snap to make it larger or another snap to make it tighter! You can get the little snap applicators on Amazon or Hobby Lobby!  Our baby is formula fed, so these are perfect! Also, they wash well and haven’t stained. I already ordered the blue multi color set too!

This bibs are very nice and soft. Overall I really like the quality and I will repurchase if they only offered more color choices for boys. I recommend this product.
